body_html:
Is it just the missing conv3d operation? Or do all operations for ConvNets need to be modified? Because when looking through the API documentation, the input tensor almost always seems to be fixed at 4D with [batch, height, width, channels].
What I can spot now but is probably incomplete:

  • avg_pool
  • max_pool
  • moments
body_text:
Is it just the missing conv3d operation? Or do all operations for ConvNets need to be modified? Because when looking through the API documentation, the input tensor almost always seems to be fixed at 4D with [batch, height, width, channels].
What I can spot now but is probably incomplete:

avg_pool

body:
Is it just the missing conv3d operation? Or do _all_ operations for ConvNets need to be modified? Because when looking through the API documentation, the input tensor almost always seems to be fixed at 4D with [batch, height, width, channels].
What I can spot now but is probably incomplete:
- avg_pool
- max_pool
- moments
